doc:
Carl Mathews https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carl_Mathews 0 Carl Mathews (February 19, 1903 – May 3, 1959), also sometimes credited as Carl Matthews, was an American character actor and stuntman of the 1930s through 1950s. Born on February 19, 1903 in Oklahoma, his first film role would be in Rough Riding Ranger in 1935. Over the next 33 years, Mathews appeared in over 200 films, shorts, and television shows, either as a performer or a stuntman. Carl_Mathews ( February_19_,_1903 – May_3_,_1959 ) , also sometimes_credited as Carl_Matthews , was an_American_character_actor_and_stuntman of the_1930s through 1950s . Born on February_19_,_1903 in Oklahoma , his_first_film_role would_be in Rough Riding Ranger in 1935 . Over the_next_33_years , Mathews appeared in over_200_films , shorts , and television_shows , either as a_performer or a_stuntman .
